medical_history.chief_complaint: Localized right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain for 5 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began on the last day of her vacation. It persisted through her flight home and the following 3 days, and it was associated with nausea, fever, and anorexia secondary to pain. The pain did not radiate, and there were no prior episodes of similar pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No past medical history. Past surgical history includes hysterectomy.
medical_history.family_history: No history of IBD or GI malignancy.
